PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-05442013-05-09HRSDC,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Equity Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Adapting the Employment Equity Act in respect of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS ADAPTING THE EMPLOYMENT EQUITY ACT IN RESPECT OF THE CANADIAN SECURITY INTELLIGENCE SERVICE (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to ensure that all language in the Regulations is consistent in both official languages and in line with current definitions and nomenclature, and to follow-up on the concerns expressed by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0094 Publication Date: 2013-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
